Ms. KLOBUCHAR. Mr. President, I rise today to discuss the legislation  that was recently signed into law to fund the Federal Government  through January 30, 2026. Like many of my colleagues and people across  the country, I wanted the shutdown to end. I also believe the  legislation to reopen the government should have included provisions…

…statement.

I also want to alert Members of the House that this new continuing  resolution (CR) released this past Saturday November 8, 2025, which  funds the government to January 30, 2026, has a serious gap in funding  for the Columbia-class submarine program.
